amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide Congress a status update on rulemaking, with respect to conditions of certification of health information technology and information blocking, required by the 21st Century Cures Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3765 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3765 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5902; text: CR S5902) To require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide Congress a status update on rulemaking, with respect to conditions of certification of health information technology and information blocking, required by the 21st Century Cures Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3765 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3765 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
